Context: A bakery makes exactly three kinds of cookieâ€”oatmeal, peanut butter, and sugar. Exactly three batches of each kind of cookie are made each week (Monday through Friday) and each batch is made, from start to finish, on a single day. The following conditions apply: No two batches of the same kind of cookie are made on the same day. At least one batch of cookies is made on Monday. The second batch of oatmeal cookies is made on the same day as the first batch of peanut butter cookies. The second batch of sugar cookies is made on Thursday.
Question: If the number of batches made on Friday is exactly one, then which one of the following could be true?
Choices:
  A: The first batch of sugar cookies is made on Monday.
  B: The first batch of oatmeal cookies is made on Tuesday.
  C: The third batch of oatmeal cookies is made on Friday.
  D: The first batch of peanut butter cookies is made on Wednesday.
  E: The second batch of peanut butter cookies is made on Tuesday.

Thought: 
Given that no two batches of the same kind of cookie are made on the same day, and each type of cookie is made three times a week, it means that cookies are made every day from Monday to Friday. 
The second batch of oatmeal cookies is made on the same day as the first batch of peanut butter cookies, so the first batch of oatmeal cookies cannot be made on Tuesday because the second batch would have to be made on the same day. 
The second batch of sugar cookies is made on Thursday, so the first batch of sugar cookies cannot be made on Monday because no two batches of the same kind of cookie are made on the same day. 
The first batch of peanut butter cookies cannot be made on Wednesday because the second batch of oatmeal cookies (which is made on the same day as the first batch of peanut butter cookies) would have to be made on Thursday, but the second batch of sugar cookies is already being made on Thursday. 
The second batch of peanut butter cookies cannot be made on Tuesday because the second batch of oatmeal cookies (which is made on the same day as the first batch of peanut butter cookies) would have to be made on Monday, but at least one batch of cookies is already being made on Monday. 
The only option left is that the third batch of oatmeal cookies is made on Friday.
